description_en: AstraZeneca is a global, science-led biopharmaceutical company with British-Swedish heritage that focuses on the discovery, development and commercialization of prescription medicines, primarily for the treatment of diseases in these main therapy areas â€“ Oncology; Cardiovascular, Renal & Metabolism; Respiratory, Gastrointestinal and Immunology. AstraZeneca operates in over 100 countries and its innovative medicines are used by millions of patients worldwide.
